SSGBM.VRI.BEM 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Reference

    Main Functions

    merge_bem_on_vri()

    Merge BEM (broad ecosystem mapping) attributes on VRI (vegetation ressource inventory) features

    update_bem_from_vri()

    Update BEM (broad ecosystem mapping) attributes based on VRI (vegetation resource inventory) attributes

    update_bem_from_wet()

    Upadate BEM (broad ecosystem mapping) attributes based on Wetland polygons attributes

    create_unique_ecosytem_dt()

    Create data of Unique ecosystem

    merge_elevation_raster_on_sf()

    Compute slope and aspect from elevation and compute mean by ifc polygon

    merge_ccb_on_vri()

    Merge BEM (broad ecosystem mapping) attributes on VRI (vegetation ressource inventory) features

    calc_forest_age_class()

    compute variable for structural stage look up and stand composition look up

    add_std_crown_fields()

    This script takes an input VRI feature class and adds two new field, STD_VRI, CROWN_BEAR and CROWN_MOOSE. It populates the STD_VRI field "C", "B" or "M" based on the existing values in the SPECIES_CD_# and SPECIES_PCT_# fields, and populates the CROWN_BEAR field with codes 1 to 4, and CROWN_MOOSE with codes H, M, L, VL and N based on the existing values in the CROWN_CLOSURE field.

    merge_unique_ecosystem_fields()

    populates the TEIS fields, REALM, GROUP, CLASS, and KIND as well as SNOW_CODE from the data provided by the unique ecosystem data table

    find_crown_area_dominant_values()

    overlays a BEM and VRI feature classes and determines the area-dominant CROWN_BEAR and CROWN_MOOSE values for each BEM polygon.

    create_RRM_ecosystem()

    Create RRM Ecosystem information

    Other Helper Functions

    set_shifted_eco_variables()

    shift eco variables

    validate_required_attributes()

    Validate that Required Attributes are in the object
